our_partner_description: With many years of experience in the field of helping families, Domicare is proud to be the best and most convenient solution for Vietnamese women.
impressive_description: With many years of experience in the field of helping families, Domicare is proud to be the best and most convenient solution for Vietnamese women.
professional_description: Experienced consulting staff & customer care, professional, dedicated. Domicare guarantees warranty service when the customer is not satisfied.
easy_to_use_description: Find a maid quickly through the web. The system provides complete information about the service and the maid, making it easy to choose the job and evaluate.
standard_employee_description: Standard employee, post ads, have complete documents. Domicare is responsible for providing training and management.
